com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl

Class FileServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.DataServiceImpl<File,java.lang.Long>
      • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.FileServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataService<File,java.lang.Long>, FileService

    @Service
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.dao")
public final class FileServiceImpl
extends DataServiceImpl<File,java.lang.Long>
implements FileService
    The class of the service layer, implements a set of methods for working with objects of the File class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    File, FileService, DataServiceImpl, FileDao
